sentence:

Mrs. SYKES. Mr. Speaker, today, I rise to recognize Reese Gallagher  as the champion of the week for Ohio's 13th Congressional District.

Mrs. SYKES. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize Tim Hauser as the  Champion of the Week for Ohio's 13th Congressional District.

Tim was recently named the Veteran of the Year by the Veterans  Service Commission of Summit County. He is a Gulf War veteran…

Mrs. SYKES. Mr. Speaker, today, I rise to recognize Captain Michelle  Wiltrout, who retired this year from the Summit County Sheriff's  Office, as this week's Champion of the Week for Ohio's 13th  Congressional District.

For 32 years, Captain Wiltrout, dedicated her career to serving and  protecting the people of Summit County in a wide range…

Mrs. SYKES. Mr. Speaker, today, I rise to recognize Jackson High  School Automotive Teacher Joseph Drury as Ohio's 13th Congressional  District Champion of the Week.

Joseph was recently awarded a $50,000 prize for his school's skilled  trades program as a winner of the 2025 Harbor Freight Tools for Schools  Prize for Teaching Excellence.…

Mrs. SYKES. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize Vince Marchetta as  the Champion of the Week for Ohio's 13th Congressional District.

Mrs. SYKES. Mr. Speaker, today I rise to recognize Reverend Dr.  Curtis Theodore Walker, Sr. as Ohio's 13th Congressional District  Champion of the Week for his 50-year career in ministry.

Mrs. SYKES. Mr. Speaker, today, I rise to recognize Mira Cahalane,  who recently won best actress at the 10th annual Dazzle Awards, as this  week's Champion of the Week for Ohio's 13th Congressional District.

The Dazzle Awards honors high school musical theater students and  departments in Northeast Ohio for their outstanding performances…

Mrs. SYKES. Mr. Speaker, today I rise to congratulate and announce as  our champion of the week North Canton City Schools Superintendent Jeff  Wendorf on his retirement after a 40-year career serving the students  of North Canton as a teacher, coach, and administrator.…

Mrs. SYKES. Mr. Speaker, today, I rise to recognize the City of  Green's 2025 Volunteer of the Year, John Piersol as Ohio's 13th  Congressional District's Champion of the Week.

Mrs. SYKES. Mr. Speaker, today, I rise to recognize The Remedy Church  and its congregation as Ohio's 13th Congressional District's Champion  of the Week.
